text: Coney Island Brewing Co. is a company controlled by Boston Beer Co. which began by selling hard root beer, and later followed up with hard ginger ale, and hard orange cream ale. In 2016, the company expanded in New England. In 2018, the company announced plans to launch its Mermaid Pilsner (which it describes as "a light lager with a heavy hand of rye malt, which adds a mild spiciness, balanced by a fruity, floral hop aroma") in parts of the Mid- Atlantic Region. ==References== ==External link== * Category:Companies based in Brooklyn Category:Alcoholic drink companies Category:Companies with year of establishment missing
